summary: Javier is crushed after his new bride leaves him. When his psychiatrist has no answers, he turns to the arms of his ex-girlfriends.
cast: Eugenio Derbez|Martina García|Alejandra Barros|Juan Ríos|Shaula Vega|Mónica Dionne|Alberto Estrella|Mauricio E. Galaz|Aarón Hernán|Mauricio Herrera|Ricardo Kleinbaum|Vanessa Mateo|Gina Morett|Regina Orozco|Yadira Pascault Orozco|Héctor Ortega|Raquel Pankowsky|Miguel Sagaz|Julian Sedgwick|Patricio Soní|Blanca Sánchez|Sharon Zundel
title: No eres tú, soy yo
